## zelos.StatementInput class

An object containing information about the space a statement input takes up during rendering.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StatementInput extends BaseStatementInput 
```
<b>Extends:</b> BaseStatementInput

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `StatementInput` class.
